PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-03122023-03-31PMO
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of the HONOURABLE IRWIN COTLER, P.C., O.C., O.Q., of Montréal, Quebec, as special adviser to the Minister of Foreign Affairs, to be known as Special Envoy on Preserving Holocaust Remembrance and Combatting Antisemitism, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on May 31, 2023, effective April 1, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of the HONOURABLE IRWIN COTLER, P.C., O.C., O.Q., of Montréal, Quebec, as special adviser to the Minister of Foreign Affairs, to be known as Special Envoy on Preserving Holocaust Remembrance and Combatting Antisemitism, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on May 31, 2023, effective April 1, 2023.
